title: Electronic row seeder
summary: Electronic row seeder processing 2,000 rows of seed per hour, conveyor compatible.

eligible.eligibleBullet02: be able to handle small batches of trays
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have a row bar dibbling and seeding unit - drum seeders are not eligible
eligible.eligibleBullet05: be able to process 2,000 rows of seed per hour
eligible.eligibleBullet06: be able to handle 600mm x 400mm trays
eligible.eligibleBullet07: be compatible with a conveyor belt system to allow for incorporation into a fully automated seeding line
